sentence.Network_en: He was wringing wet after working in the field in the hot sun.
sentence.Network_cn: 烈日下在田里干活使他汗流满面.

sentence.Network_en: The Government has got to get a grip. Wringing its hands and saying it is a world problem just isn't good enough.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府必须采取切实行动，一味搓着手感叹说这是个全球性问题是远远不够的。

sentence.Network_en: He is wringing out the water from his swimming trunks.
sentence.Network_cn: 他正在把游泳裤中的水绞出来.

Wright Brothers 莱特兄弟wring out 高级特技飞行wrinkle 起皱;蒙皮挫曲
wring ... n. 绞, 拧, 挤, 扭 wring out 扭出; 绞出(水)来 press out squeeze twist wrest [七国语言]英汉公共大词典.

entry.def: If you wring something out of someone, you manage to make them give it to you even though they do not want to.

example.ex: Buyers use different ruses to wring free credit out of their suppliers...
example.tran: 买主们千方百计想从供货商那儿无息赊购。

example.ex: In this way, he hoped to put pressure on the British and thus to wring concessions from them.
example.tran: 他希望通过这种方式向英国人施压，从而迫使他们让步。

entry.tran: (通常因忧愁、焦虑而)绞扭双手（干叹息)
entry.def: If someone wrings their hands, they hold them together and twist and turn them, usually because they are very worried or upset about something. You can also say that someone is wringing their hands when they are expressing sorrow that a situation is so bad but are saying that they are unable to change it.

example.ex: The Government has got to get a grip. Wringing its hands and saying it is a world problem just isn't good enough.
example.tran: 政府必须采取切实行动，一味搓着手感叹说这是个全球性问题是远远不够的。

entry.tran: 扭断…的脖子(表示非常生某人的气)
entry.def: If you say that you will wring someone's neck or that you would like to wring their neck, you mean that you are very angry or irritated with them.

example.ex: That crazy Debbie! He could wring her neck for this!...
example.tran: 黛比那个疯子！他会为这把她的脖子拧断的！

example.ex: I still love you even though I'd like to wring your neck.
example.tran: 虽然我想掐死你，但我还是爱你的。

auth_sentence.content: Why the hand-wringing about the increase in older mothers?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why the hand-wringing about the increase in older mothers?

auth_sentence.content: There's no need for wringing of hands by investors.
